thread.title: A Google employee is choosing to live in a truck—but its still a choice
thread.title_full: A Google employee is choosing to live in a truck—but its still a choice

title: A Google employee is choosing to live in a truck—but its still a choice
text:
A Google employee is choosing to live in a truck—but it's still a choice 
Daily Dot Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Business Insider only as Brandon, decided to live in the back of a box truck after interning for the search company in 2014. During his summer stay, he found the cheapest housing options provided on campus would cost about $2,000 a month."Once I realized I was only ever at my stupidly expensive apartment to sleep, I started hatching my plan," he...
